overview: "A partire dal Dolce brings together "portraits-interventions" of a dozen or so thinkers, artists, friends of Gianfranco Baruchello (including extremely rare footage of Jean-François Lyotard), who comment on the concept of the "dolce" (gentle/soft/sweet)"  Claudine Eizykman, Les Rendez-vous du Cinéma Expérimental, February 2000
title: A partire dal dolce
